text: "Angel Say No" is a song by American rock band Tommy Tutone. It's the lead single from their self-titled debut album (1980) and is the first track on the album. It peaked at number 38 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Tommy Tutone *Tommy Heath – rhythm guitar, lead vocals, keyboards *Jim Keller – lead guitar, backing vocals *Terry Nails – bass, backing vocals *Micky Shine – drums, backing vocals, percussion ;Production *Ed Thacker – production, engineering *Brian Leshon – production *Phil Jost – production ==References== Category:1980 songs
title: Angel Say No
